DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Imperva Firewalls using firmware version 6.0+.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: Firewall, NullAlert, Unauthorized Access to Service (Drop All Unblocked TrafficAudits)
1, Firewall, TCPTrafficAudit, Unauthorized Access to Service

FastFormatter.description: if port is N/A use DstPort

FastPattern.description: 2, Firewall, IPTrafficAudit, Unauthorized Access to Service

FastFormatter.description: if port is N/A use DstPort

FastPattern.description: 3, Firewall, UDPTrafficAudit, Unauthorized Access to Service

FastFormatter.description: if port is N/A use DstPort

FastPattern.description: 4, Firewall, ICMPTrafficAudit, Unauthorized Access to Service

FastFormatter.description: if port is N/A use DstPort

FastPattern.description: 5, Firewall, LandAttackDenial, LAND Attack
6, Firewall, UnusualIPTraffic, IP messages (keep towards bottom of other TrafficAudits)

FastFormatter.format: Blocked Bad IP Option Length from "$17"
Blocked Bad IP Option Padding from "$17"
Blocked Bad Source IP Address from "$17"

FastFormatter.description: Too Small TTL (remove Multiple IP, IP in Desc); Blocked
Too Small TTL (remove Multiple IP, IP in Desc)
Too Small TTL (no IP in Desc); Blocked
Too Small TTL (no IP in Desc)

FastPattern.description: 7, Firewall, UnusualTCPTraffic, TCP messages (keep towards bottom of other TrafficAudits)

FastFormatter.format: Blocked Bad TCP Option Length from "$17"
Blocked Bad TCP Option Padding from "$17"
Blocked Modified TCP Retransmission Data from "$17"

FastFormatter.description: SSL Untraceable Connection Unsupported Cipher; Blocked

FastFormatter.format: Blocked Non Zero Reserved Flags from "$17"

FastFormatter.condition: (?:Multiple IP - )?SYN with Non Zero ACK Sequence from (\S*):Block
FastFormatter.description: SYN with Non Zero ACK Sequence; Blocked
FastFormatter.format: Blocked SYN with Non Zero ACK Sequence from "$17"

FastFormatter.condition: (?:Multiple IP - )?SYN with Non Zero ACK Sequence from (\S*)
FastFormatter.description: SYN with Non Zero ACK Sequence
FastFormatter.format: SYN with Non Zero ACK Sequence from "$17"

FastPattern.description: 8, Firewall, UnusualICMPTraffic, ICMP messages (keep towards bottom of other TrafficAudits)

FastFormatter.description: Too Small TTL (remove Multiple IP, IP in Desc); Blocked
Too Small TTL (remove Multiple IP, IP in Desc)
Too Small TTL (no IP in Desc); Blocked
Too Small TTL (no IP in Desc)

FastPattern.description: 9, System, UserLogoff, User logged out

FastFormatter.description: parse for user; remove logoff reason
reason for logoff if included in Desc

FastPattern.description: 10, System, UserLogon, User logged in from
11, System, UserLogonFailure, User logged in from
12, System, PolicyAudit, Policy created
13, System, PolicyModify, Policy changed
14, System, PolicyModify, Parameter changed
15, System, PolicyModify, password setting has been changed
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=Regular.*Message=\s*Password setting (.*) has been changed to

FastPattern.description: 16, System, PolicyAccess, Regular, HTTP method is (not)? allowed in URL
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=Regular.*Message=HTTP method \S+ is(?: not)? allowed in URL\s+\S+.+Web Application:\s+[-\w\s.]+ - [-\w\s.]+ - ([-\w\s.]+)

FastFormatter.condition: (HTTP method \S+ is(?: not)? allowed in URL)\s+(\S+).+Web Application:\s+[-\w\s.]+ - [-\w\s.]+ - [-\w\s.]+\s{3}\.

FastPattern.description: 17, System, PolicyAccess, Regular, URL was added to the profile in protect | learn mode
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=Regular.*Message=URL\s+.+ was added to the profile in \S+ mode\. Web Application:\s+[-\w\s._]+ - [-\w\s._]+ - ([-\w\s._]+)

FastFormatter.condition: URL\s+(.+) was added to the profile in (protect|learn) mode\..*
FastFormatter.description: URL was added to the profile in protect | learn mode
FastFormatter.format: URL "$12" was added to the profile in "$13" mode

FastPattern.description: 18, System, PolicyAccess, Regular, URL was (updated | deleted from the profile)
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=Regular.*Message=URL\s+.+ was (?:updated|deleted from the profile)\. Web Application:\s+[-\w\s._]+ - [-\w\s._]+ - ([-\w\s._]+)

FastFormatter.condition: URL\s+(.+) (\([^)]+\)) was deleted from the profile\..*
FastFormatter.description: URL was deleted from the profile
web app info - URL was deleted from profile

FastPattern.description: 19, System, PolicyAccess, Regular, Folder was updated

FastFormatter.condition: Folder\s+(.+) was updated\..+\.\. The folder was (locked|unlocked)\.

FastPattern.description: 20, System, PolicyAccess, Regular, Query Group was updated

FastFormatter.description: Query Group was updated with parens
Query Group was updated w/o parens

FastPattern.description: 21, System, PolicyScopeChange, Policy applied to
22, System, PolicyScopeChange, Regular, Gateway group assigned to server group
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=Regular.*Message=(?:IP changed:)?\s*Gateway group \S+ assigned to server group .+ for IP address \S+

FastFormatter.condition: (?:IP changed:)?\s*Gateway group (\S+) assigned to server group (.+) for IP address (\S+)\s{1,2}
FastFormatter.format: Gateway group "$12" assigned to server group "$13" for IP "$14"

FastPattern.description: 23, System, UserLogoff, Session of User killed by user

FastFormatter.condition: Session\(s\) of User (\S+) killed by user (\S+)\.
Session\(s\) of User (\S+) killed by user \S+\.

FastPattern.description: 24, System, UserModifyAttribute, Password reset/changed
25, System, UserModifyPrivileges, User granted permission to
26, System, UserModifyPrivileges, User granted EDIT|VIEW|permission on
27, System, UserModifyPrivileges, User revoked privileges on item
28, System, ChangeGroupAttribute, Group revoked privileges
29, System, NewDomainMember, User created
30, System, NewGroupMember, User was added to group
31, System, PolicyAccess, Regular, Group created
32, System, ServiceAudit, service was created
33, System, ServiceInfo, Site was created
34, System, ServiceInfo, ADC content has not been updated
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=OldAdcContent.*Message=The ADC content has not been updated for the last \S+ days

FastFormatter.condition: The ADC content has not been updated for the last (\S+) days\.
FastFormatter.format: ADC content has not been updated for the last $12 days

FastFormatter.condition: The ADC content has not been updated for the last (\S+) days\.
FastFormatter.format: ADC content has not been updated for the last $12 days

FastPattern.description: 35, System, DeleteGroup, Regular, Group deleted
36, System, DeleteGroup, Regular, Gateway Group removed from server group
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=Regular.*Message=\s+Gateway Group \S+ removed from server group \S+ for IP address [\d.]+

FastFormatter.condition: \s*Gateway Group (\S+) removed from server group (\S+) for IP address ([\d.]+)\s+
FastFormatter.format: Gateway group "$12" removed from server group "$13" for IP "$14"

FastFormatter.condition: \s*Gateway Group \S+ removed from server group \S+ for IP address ([\d.]+)\s+
\s*Gateway Group (\S+) removed from server group \S+ for IP address [\d.]+\s+

FastPattern.description: 37, System, PolicyAccess, Regular, Site | URL List was created
38, System, SystemStatus, Regular, Operation mode for Server Group changed to
FastPattern.pattern: System:Type=Regular.*Message=Operation mode for Server Group .+ changed to

FastFormatter.condition: Operation mode for Server Group (.+) changed to (\S+)
FastFormatter.format: Operation mode for server group "$12" changed to "$13"

FastFormatter.condition: Operation mode for Server Group (.+) changed to (\S+)
FastFormatter.format: Operation mode for Server Group "$12" changed to "$13"

FastPattern.description: 39, System, SystemStatus, GatewayStateChange, Gateway is now up | down
40, System, SystemStatus, ServerStatus, Server started on IP
41, SystemStatus, GatewayStateChange, The status of the gateway gateway is

FastFormatter.condition: The status of the gateway ([-\w\s._]+) is (\S+)\..*
FastFormatter.format: The status of the gateway "$12" is "$13"

FastFormatter.condition: The status of the gateway ([-\w\s.]+) is (\S+)\..*

FastPattern.description: 42, SystemStatus, GatewayThroughputThreshold, The status of the gateway gateway is
43, SoftwareUpdate, DownloadAdcContentSucceeded | FailedToDownloadAdcContent, The status of the gateway gateway is
44, SoftwareUpdate, ODM, Web Vulnerability Management upgrade
45, ProcessWarning, Assessment (Failed)
46, ProcessStop, Assessment
NullAlert, AuditView drops
NullAlert, User info changed for
NullAlert, Default archive settings changed
Black Hole
